name: roblox-code-generator
description: AI-powered platform for generating Roblox games

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: cd roblox-claude-codegen && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:frontend: cd roblox-lovable-ui && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd roblox-claude-codegen && npm install && cd ../roblox-lovable-ui && npm install
